channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- Hubshare
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- Hubshare

item.title: CVE-2022-39018|2024-08-03T11:10:32.485Z -- m-files -- hubshare
item.description: Broken access controls on PDFtron data in M-Files Hubshare before 3.3.11.3 allows unauthenticated attackers to access restricted PDF files via a known URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-39019|2024-08-03T11:10:32.404Z -- m-files -- hubshare
item.description: Broken access controls on PDFtron WebviewerUI in M-Files Hubshare before 3.3.11.3 allows unauthenticated attackers to upload malicious files to the application server.

item.title: CVE-2022-39016|2024-08-03T11:10:32.402Z -- m-files -- hubshare
item.description: Javascript injection in PDFtron in M-Files Hubshare before 3.3.10.9 allows authenticated attackers to perform an account takeover via a crafted PDF upload.

item.title: CVE-2022-39017|2024-08-03T11:10:32.289Z -- m-files -- hubshare
item.description: Improper input validation and output encoding in all comments fields, in M-Files Hubshare before 3.3.10.9 allows authenticated attackers to introduce cross-site scripting attacks via specially crafted comments.
